import {Component, Input, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {UntypedFormGroup} from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-offer-creation', templateUrl: './offer-creation.component.html', styleUrls: ['./offer-creation.component.scss'] }) export class OfferCreationComponent implements OnInit { offerForm: UntypedFormGroup; @Input() categories: string[] = ["I'm looking for", "Product", "Service"]; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } offerSubmit() { // TODO: implement submit logic } }
